metadata.name: Dress for comfort
metadata.description: From Kenny Schachter's METADADA exhibit, the inaugural show at Galerie Nagel Draxler's Crypto Kiosk space https://nagel-draxler.de/exhibition/metadada/ 1/1 + 1 artist's proof. The initial purchase of the 1/1 NFT will be accompanied by a unique printed output from the video. The NFT may subsequently be resold with or without the print.
